text: Eric Walfred Anderson (May 26, 1970 â€“ December 9, 2018) was an American basketball player. He is best known for his college career at Indiana University and played two seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA) for the New York Knicks. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Anderson died on December 9, 2018 at the age of 48. == References == Category:1970 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Eric Anderson
